sys_script_include.description: Retrieves information about the app's dependencies to other apps and required versions.
sys_script_include.name: AppGetDependencies

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_datasilosci.AppGetDependencies</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Retrieves information about the app's dependencies to other apps and required versions.</description><name>AppGetDependencies</name><script><![CDATA[function AppGetDependencies()
{
	return [
		{
			name: 'DevTools',
			version: '1.25.0',
			url: 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-devtools/',
			website_url: 'https://www.wildgrube.com/servicenow-devtools'
		}
		,
		{
			name: 'DataSilos',
			version: '3.0.0',
			url: 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-datasilos/',
			website_url: 'https://www.wildgrube.com/servicenow-datasilos'
		}
	];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-28 14:49:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>ed9042f21bfef810edf3642aab4bcb80</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AppGetDependencies</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_datasilosci">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ed9042f21bfef810edf3642aab4bcb80</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 14:49:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
